metadata.Title: CVE-2013-4523 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in message/lib.php in Moodle through 2.2.11, 2.3.x before 2.3.10, 2.4.x before 2.4.7, and 2.5.x before 2.5.3 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted message.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-4523` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.3-1').
